value:
As a princess myself, I feel sympathy
for Princess Veronica. I wonder if she
is acting of her own volition.

My father, the Adrestian emperor,
was stripped of his power. As his
successor, I will reclaim what he lost.

Having been thrust into an unfamiliar
world, I find it difficult to feel at ease.
Perhaps you know the feeling.

Your enemies are similar to my foes
in my own world. We may both stand
to learn from our time together.

Excuse me. I was taking a moment
to rest. In my own world, I was so
busy that I rarely had the time.

I was asked to say hello to you. Now
that I have, I will take my leave.
I am always getting stronger.
A step forward.

An underwhelming result... I will not
let it happen again.
Watch as I master this new power.

I am Edelgard von Hresvelg, heir
apparent of the Adrestian Empire.
I will follow you, but I bow to no one.

You tend to look at me as though you
expect me to leave at any moment.
I suppose it can't be helped.$k$pYou need not worry, however. Even if
I did not care about this country and
its people...$k$pFor the sake of my own ambitions,
I would still be sure to see this effort
to its end. I promise you that.$k$pRemember who I am. I am Edelgard
von Hresvelg, and I am sworn to help
you vanquish your enemies.$k$pWith my allegiance to your cause,
victory is a foregone conclusion.
やああっ！
決めるっ！
くああっ！
この程度！
I will prevail!
I'll strike you down!
Don't waste my time.
Watch this!
I can't die...not yet...
Hehe
I'm a student at the Officer's Academy. For now.
Gah! Please don't do that!
A painting? ...MY painting?! But how did you... Leave. Now. I have urgent business to attend to!
My strength is due, in part, to the power of Crests.
I value this experience. In my future, a massive battle awaits...
All obstacles will be crushed...without exception.
Please use me well. Together, we cannot lose.
Very well.
Well then?
I will go.
